Returns: Returns a CharSequence containing the item's label. If the item does not have a label, its name is returned.
Parameters: PackageManager: A PackageManager from which the label can be loaded; usually the PackageManager from which you originally retrieved this item.
loadLabel(android.content.pm.PackageMana.Description: Retrieve the current textual label associated with this item. This will call back on the given PackageManager to load the label from the application.

getBannerResource().Description: Return the banner resource identifier to use for this component. If the component defines a banner, that is used; else, the application banner is used.

ClassDesc: Base class containing information common to all application components (@B_android#content#pm#ActivityInfo_E@, @B_android#content#pm#ServiceInfo_E@). This class is not intended to be used by itself; it is simply here to share common definitions between all application components. As such, it does not itself implement Parcelable, but does provide convenience methods to assist in the implementation of Parcelable in subclasses.
